Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

validation.validation: The provided Customer Payment is not valid for the provided Customer Refund.

Customer_Unapplied_Payment_Refund_2.0_Su.description: Retrieves or submits the refund amount for the payment. The amount must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to the on-account amount. When this field is blank, Workday uses the total amount available for refund.

validation.validation: Refund amount for the payment "[Payment]" is invalid. Specify a refund amount that's greater than zero, and less than or equal to the on-account payment balance of [Payment Balance].

validation.validation: The provided Customer Invoice Adjustment is not valid for the provided Customer Refund.

Customer_Invoice_Adjustment_Refund_2.0_S.description: Retrieves or submits the refund amount for the adjustment. The amount must be greater than 0 and less than or equal to the adjustment amount due. When this field is blank, Workday uses the total amount available for refund.

validation.validation: Refund amount for the adjustment "[Adjustment]" is invalid. Specify a refund amount that's greater than zero, and less than or equal to the amount due [Amount Due].
